verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> (not [sent] from <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1223>agency<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> who <S%G1453>raised<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>),
and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> who are with me, to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of Galatia: <S%G1053><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

who <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> for our <S%G266>sins,<s%> that He might <S%G1807>deliver<s%> us out of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father,<s%>
to <S%G3739>whom<s%> [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forevermore.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

I <S%G2296>am<s%> <S%G2296>amazed<s%> that you are <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5030>quickly<s%> <S%G3346>deserting<s%> <S%G575><s%> Him who <S%G2564>called<s%> you by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> for a <S%G2087>different<s%> <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> is [really] not <S%G243>another;<s%> <S%G1487>only<s%> <S%G3361><s%> there are <S%G5100>some<s%> who are <S%G5015>disturbing<s%> you, and <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G3344>distort<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> we, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> should <S%G2097>preach<s%> to you a <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2097>preached<s%> to you, let him be <S%G331>accursed.<s%>

As we have <S%G4275>said<s%> <S%G4275>before,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G737>now,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2097>preaching<s%> to you a <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to that <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3880>received,<s%> let him be <S%G331>accursed.<s%>

For am I <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3982>seeking<s%> the <S%G3982>favor<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> am I <S%G2212>striving<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> I were <S%G2089>still<s%> trying to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> I would not be a bond-servant of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
For I would <S%G1107>have<s%> you <S%G1107>know,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> which was <S%G2097>preached<s%> by me is not <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G444>man.<s%>

For I <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> it from <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> was I <S%G1321>taught<s%> it, but [I received it] <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of my <S%G4218>former<s%> <S%G391>manner<s%> of <S%G391>life<s%> in <S%G2454>Judaism,<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> I used to <S%G1377>persecute<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>beyond<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G5236>measure,<s%> and tried to <S%G4199>destroy<s%> it;

and I was <S%G4298>advancing<s%> in <S%G2454>Judaism<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of my <S%G4915>contemporaries<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> my <S%G1085>countrymen,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G4053>extremely<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> for my <S%G3967>ancestral<s%> <S%G3862>traditions.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> He who had <S%G873>set<s%> me <S%G873>apart,<s%> [even] from my mother's <S%G2836>womb,<s%> and <S%G2564>called<s%> me <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G5485>grace,<s%> was <S%G2106>pleased<s%>

to <S%G601>reveal<s%> His <S%G5207>Son<s%> in me, that I might <S%G2097>preach<s%> Him <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> I did not <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G4323>consult<s%> with <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%>

<S%G3761>nor<s%> did I <S%G424>go<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me; but I <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to <S%G688>Arabia,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G3825>once<s%> <S%G3825>more<s%> to <S%G1154>Damascus.<s%>

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G3326>later<s%> I <S%G424>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2477>become<s%> <S%G2477>acquainted<s%> with <S%G2786>Cephas,<s%> and <S%G1961>stayed<s%> with him <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>
But I did not <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2087>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2385>James,<s%> the Lord's <S%G80>brother.<s%>
<S%G1161>(Now<s%> in <S%G3739>what<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> to you, I <S%G2400>assure<s%> you <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that I am not <S%G5574>lying.<s%>)
<S%G1899>Then<s%> I <S%G2064>went<s%> into the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G4947>Syria<s%> and <S%G2791>Cilicia.<s%>
And I was [still] <S%G50>unknown<s%> by <S%G4383>sight<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea<s%> which were in <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

but <S%G3440>only,<s%> they kept <S%G191>hearing,<s%> "He who <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> us is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4218>once<s%> tried to <S%G4199>destroy.<s%>"
And they were <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>because<s%> of me.
